title: Here We Go Again (Demi Lovato album)
summary: Here We Go Again is the second studio album by American singer Demi Lovato. It was released on July 21, 2009, through Hollywood Records. Unlike their previous album, Don't Forget (2008), Lovato did not collaborate with the Jonas Brothers, as they wanted to work with different people and give the album a personal approach. Lovato collaborated for the album with established songwriters and producers, such as E. Kidd Bogart, Gary Clark, Toby Gad, John Mayer, Jon McLaughlin, Lindy Robbins and John Fields, who produced their previous album Don't Forget.
